name: Loot Dungeon
description:
Loot Dungeon is a 2D roguelike built in Unity for the Spring 2019 Game Design and Development DeCal. Chase the call of riches and treasure as you descend into the murky depths of the unknown. Fend off monsters, loot their corpses, and stash your finest prizes away for future use. Will you survive to tell the tale and escape with untold wealth? (Note: Play on fullscreen)

Team:

Alston Chan - Art, animations

Bill Cheng - Enemies, items, mechanics, sound

Henry Zhang - Movement and combat, weapon generation

Stephen Zhou - Inventory/UI, level generation/progression
